data.title: Airport Shuttles
data.text:
The CFAY Airport Shuttle provides bus transportation for travelers to and from Yokosuka Naval Base, Yokota Air Base, Narita International Airport and Haneda International Airport. This is where travelers may sign up for CFAY Airport Shuttle transportation.

The CFAY Airport Shuttle Bus Desk is located on the first floor of the Transaction Service Center Building 1555.

Office Hours

8 a.m. to 10 a.m. and 11 a.m. to 5 p.m. Monday through Sunday including all American and Japanese holidays

Contact us

CFAY_Bus@us.navy.mil

From DSN: 243-7777

From off base in Japan or Japanese mobile phone: 046-816-7777

From international: 011 +81-46-816-7777

Shuttle Location Guide for Haneda Terminal 3

FAQs

Sign Up For Bus Transportation

NARITA INTERNATIONAL AIRPORT OR HANEDA INTERNATIONAL AIRPORT

Shuttle requests must be made within 30 days of travel date. Please fill out this signup form.

YOKOTA AIR BASE

There is no reservation request. For more information, please review the CFAY Bus Schedule. Travelers must present a copy of orders with Line of Accounting upon check-in. Travelers who cannot provide this will be designated "Space Available."
